welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dudley, a charming town known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our historic sites, stunning nature reserves, and vibrant cultural scene during your visit. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport is used for transporting goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
